intro:
TANDANG SANGAR IS A DIGITAL COLLECTIVE DEDICATED TO THE RAW, THE UNPOLISHED, AND THE LOUD.

Founded in 2026, we operate from the shadows of Surakarta. We believe that culture is not created in boardrooms, but in basements, street corners, and makeshift studios.

team.name: RIZKY 'HAMMER'
team.desc: Vinyl addict and noise connoisseur. Menulis untuk hidup, hidup untuk gigs.

team.name: SARASVATI
team.desc: Shoots exclusively on expired film. Menangkap momen sebelum hilang ditelan jaman.
